Table: organization_alternate_name

Alternate names for organizations either multilingual or defunct

organization_alternate_name Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
organization.identifier organization_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The organization identifier this name belongs to.
alternate_name text UNIQUE#1 NOT NULL

The alternate name of the organization.
language character varying(3) NOT NULL

The language used for this alternate name. Format ISO-639-1, fallback ISO-639-2T
deprecated boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false

If the name is historical and no longer used. Default False
identifier serial PRIMARY KEY

An automatically-generated unique numeric identifier.

 

organization_alternate_name Constraints
Name Constraint
iso_lang_length CHECK ((char_length((language)::text) >= 2))
